TenMilManUI/UserInputs/SDLMouseInput.h

00001 // header file for mouse input.  you can change between
00002 // mouse input and table input in the main.cpp file by
00003 // commenting out one of the two initialization lines.
00004 
00005 #ifndef SDLMOUSEINPUT_H
00006 #define SDLMOUSEINPUT_H
00007 
00008 #include <SDL.h>
00009 #include <iostream>
00010 
00011 #include "UserInput.h"
00012 #include <TenMilManUI/TenUI_Globals.h>
00013 #include <TenMilManUI/UserInputs/Events/PointEvent.h>
00014 #include <TenMilManUI/UserInputs/Events/ZoomPointEvent.h>
00015 #include <TenMilManUI/UserInputs/Events/MultiPointEvent.h>
00016 #include <TenMilManUI/UI/Core/UIComponent.h>
00017 
00018 namespace TenUI {
00019         
00020         class SDLMouseInput : public UserInput {
00021         protected:      
00022                 SDL_Event event;
00023                 int x,y, dx,dy; // delta x, delta y
00024                 bool pressed, dp; // delta pressed (to see if there's a change)
00025                 
00026                 unsigned long uid;
00027                 
00028         public:
00029                 SDLMouseInput() : UserInput(),x(-1),y(-1),uid(UserInput::getNextUserID()) {
00030                         addEventType(PointEvent::DOWN_EVENT_TYPE);
00031                         addEventType(PointEvent::MOVE_EVENT_TYPE);
00032                         addEventType(PointEvent::UP_EVENT_TYPE);
00033                         addEventType(ZoomPointEvent::ZOOM_EVENT_TYPE);
00034                         addEventType(MultiPointEvent::MULTIPOINT_EVENT_TYPE);
00035                         
00036                         pressed = false;
00037                 }
00038                 
00039                 virtual void init() {
00040                         uid = getNextUserID();
00041                 }
00042 
00043                 virtual bool hoverCapable(){
00044                         return true;
00045                 }
00046                 
00047                 virtual bool update(){
00048                         bool zoomin = false;
00049                         bool zoomout = false;
00050                         
00051                         string evtType = "";
00052                         dx = 0; dy = 0; dp = false;
00053                         
00054                         SDL_PollEvent( &event );
00055         
00056                         if( event.type == SDL_ACTIVEEVENT )
00057                         {
00058                                 //TODO: Handle entering and exiting windows
00059                                 //cout << (event.active.gain == 0 ? "EXITING" : "ENTERING") << " WINDOW\n";
00060                         }
00061                         
00062                         
00063                         if( event.type == SDL_MOUSEMOTION )     {
00064                                 dx = event.button.x - x;
00065                                 x = x + dx;
00066                                 
00067                                 dy = (getTenUI()->getGraphicsOptions().getHeight() - event.button.y) - y; 
00068                                 y = y + dy;
00069                                 
00070                                 evtType = PointEvent::MOVE_EVENT_TYPE;
00071                         }else if( event.type == SDL_MOUSEBUTTONDOWN ) {
00072                                 if(event.button.button == 1 && !pressed){
00073                                         dp = true;
00074                                         pressed = true;
00075                                         evtType = PointEvent::DOWN_EVENT_TYPE;
00076 
00077                                 }else if(event.button.button == 4){
00078                                         zoomin = true;
00079                                 }else if(event.button.button == 5){
00080                                         zoomout = true;
00081                                 }
00082                         }else if( event.type == SDL_MOUSEBUTTONUP ) {
00083                                 if(event.button.button == 1 && pressed){
00084                                         dp = true;
00085                                         pressed = false;
00086                                         evtType = PointEvent::UP_EVENT_TYPE;
00087                                 }
00088                         // Test For Quit
00089                         }else if( event.type == SDL_KEYDOWN ){
00090                                 if( event.key.keysym.sym == SDLK_ESCAPE)
00091                     {
00092                         quit = true;
00093                                 }
00094                         }else if( event.type == SDL_QUIT ) {
00095                         quit = true;
00096                     }  
00097                         
00098                         if(zoomin){
00099 
00100                                 shared_ptr<MultiPointEvent> mpe(new MultiPointEvent(uid, uiid));
00101                                 mpe->addPointEvent(shared_ptr<ZoomPointEvent>(new ZoomPointEvent( ZoomPointEvent::ZOOM_EVENT_TYPE , uid, uiid,0,5, x,y,shared_ptr<UIComponent>() )));
00102                                 dispatchEvent(mpe);
00103                         }else if(zoomout){
00104 
00105                                 shared_ptr<MultiPointEvent> mpe(new MultiPointEvent(uid, uiid));
00106                                 mpe->addPointEvent(shared_ptr<ZoomPointEvent>(new ZoomPointEvent( ZoomPointEvent::ZOOM_EVENT_TYPE , uid, uiid,0,-5, x,y,shared_ptr<UIComponent>() )));
00107                                 dispatchEvent(mpe);
00108                                 //dispatchEvent(shared_ptr<ZoomPointEvent>(new ZoomPointEvent( ZoomPointEvent::ZOOM_EVENT_TYPE , uid, uiid,0,-5, x,y,shared_ptr<UIComponent>() )));
00109                         }else if(evtType != "" && (dx != 0 || dy != 0 || dp)){
00110                                 shared_ptr<MultiPointEvent> mpe(new MultiPointEvent(uid, uiid));
00111                                 mpe->addPointEvent(shared_ptr<PointEvent>(new PointEvent(evtType, uid, uiid,0,x,y,pressed, shared_ptr<UIComponent>() )));
00112                                 dispatchEvent(mpe);
00113                         }else if( quit ){               
00114                                 dispatchEvent(shared_ptr<UserInputEvent>(new UserInputEvent(UserInputEvent::QUIT_EVENT_TYPE, uid, uiid)));
00115                         }       
00116                         
00117                         return true;
00118                 }
00119                 
00120         };
00121 
00122 
00123 }
00124 
00125 #endif
